languages.text: {n}Тяжеловесный расшитый золотыми нитями камзол словно бы придает губернатору объема, но не скрывает его неумение держаться в седле. Впивающиеся в бока лошади сапоги, неловкое движение руки, терзающей поводья, мелко дрожащие пальцы выдают нервозность и неуверенность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тяжеловесный расшитый золотыми нитями камзол не может скрыть крайнее напряжение, с которым губернатор балансирует в седле. Впивающиеся в круп сапоги, неловкое движение руки, терзающей поводья, мелко дрожащие пальцы выдают весьма почтенный возраст. Едва ли Руолдо забрался на лошадь без посторонней помощи.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The governor's heavy gold-stitched jacket adds a certain presence to his figure, but it cannot hide how poor of a rider he is. The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжеловесный расшитый золотыми нитями камзол словно бы придает губернатору объема, но не скрывает его неумение держаться в седле. Впивающиеся в бока лошади сапоги, неловкое движение руки, терзающей поводья, мелко дрожащие пальцы выдают нервозность и неуверенность.{/n}

The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}

{n}The governor's heavy gold-stitched jacket adds a certain presence to his figure, but it cannot hide how poor of a rider he is. The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管总督身上穿着金边夹克，但他糟糕的骑术依然被你看得清清楚楚。他的马靴戳在了马的肋部，双手随意摆弄着缰绳，手指颤抖。这一切都表明，他此刻非常紧张，而且缺乏自控能力。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's heavy gold-stitched jacket adds a certain presence to his figure, but it cannot hide how poor of a rider he is. The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管总督身上穿着金边夹克，但他糟糕的骑术依然被你看得清清楚楚。他的马靴戳在了马的肋部，双手随意摆弄着缰绳，手指颤抖。这一切都表明，他此刻非常紧张，而且缺乏自控能力。{/n}

languages.text: {n}総督は金の刺繍が施された重々しい上着をまとい、それなりの風格を漂わせてはいるが、乗馬の下手さはどうにもごまかせない。馬の脇腹に無造作に押し当てられたブーツ、不安げに弄ばれる手綱、かすかに震える指先―そのひとつひとつが、彼の緊張と馬を扱いきれていない様子を如実に示していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's heavy gold-stitched jacket adds a certain presence to his figure, but it cannot hide how poor of a rider he is. The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は金の刺繍が施された重々しい上着をまとい、それなりの風格を漂わせてはいるが、乗馬の下手さはどうにもごまかせない。馬の脇腹に無造作に押し当てられたブーツ、不安げに弄ばれる手綱、かすかに震える指先―そのひとつひとつが、彼の緊張と馬を扱いきれていない様子を如実に示していた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La pesada chaqueta bordada en oro del gobernador confiere cierto porte a su figura, pero no logra ocultar su torpeza como jinete. El modo en que clava las botas en los flancos del caballo, sus manos manejando torpemente las riendas y sus dedos temblorosos, todo ello delata su nerviosismo y una falta total de control.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's heavy gold-stitched jacket adds a certain presence to his figure, but it cannot hide how poor of a rider he is. The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La pesada chaqueta bordada en oro del gobernador confiere cierto porte a su figura, pero no logra ocultar su torpeza como jinete. El modo en que clava las botas en los flancos del caballo, sus manos manejando torpemente las riendas y sus dedos temblorosos, todo ello delata su nerviosismo y una falta total de control.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Valinin altın yoğunluklu işlemeli ceketi, endamına belli bir ağırlık katsa da ne kadar kötü bir binici olduğunu gizleyemiyor. Çizmelerinin altın böğrüne batışı, dizginlerle oynayışı ve titreyen parmakları; gergin olduğuna ve kontrolün onun elinde olmadığına işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's heavy gold-stitched jacket adds a certain presence to his figure, but it cannot hide how poor of a rider he is. The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Valinin altın yoğunluklu işlemeli ceketi, endamına belli bir ağırlık katsa da ne kadar kötü bir binici olduğunu gizleyemiyor. Çizmelerinin altın böğrüne batışı, dizginlerle oynayışı ve titreyen parmakları; gergin olduğuna ve kontrolün onun elinde olmadığına işaret ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La lourde veste brodée d'or du gouverneur lui confère une certaine prestance, sans pour autant parvenir à dissimuler le piètre cavalier qu'il est. La façon dont ses bottes s'enfoncent dans le flanc de son cheval, ses mains qui triturent les rênes et ses doigts tremblants trahissent sa nervosité et son manque de maîtrise.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's heavy gold-stitched jacket adds a certain presence to his figure, but it cannot hide how poor of a rider he is. The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La lourde veste brodée d'or du gouverneur lui confère une certaine prestance, sans pour autant parvenir à dissimuler le piètre cavalier qu'il est. La façon dont ses bottes s'enfoncent dans le flanc de son cheval, ses mains qui triturent les rênes et ses doigts tremblants trahissent sa nervosité et son manque de maîtrise.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die goldbestickte Jacke des Gouverneurs verleiht ihm eine gewisse Ausstrahlung, kann aber nicht verbergen, dass er ein lausiger Reiter ist. Die Art, wie sich seine Stiefel in die Flanken des Pferdes bohren, wie seine zitternde Hand an den Zügeln reißt ... alles Zeichen von Nervosität und mangelnder Kontrolle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's heavy gold-stitched jacket adds a certain presence to his figure, but it cannot hide how poor of a rider he is. The way his boots dig into the horse's sides, his hands fiddling with the reins, his trembling fingers — all speak of nervousness and a lack of control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die goldbestickte Jacke des Gouverneurs verleiht ihm eine gewisse Ausstrahlung, kann aber nicht verbergen, dass er ein lausiger Reiter ist. Die Art, wie sich seine Stiefel in die Flanken des Pferdes bohren, wie seine zitternde Hand an den Zügeln reißt ... alles Zeichen von Nervosität und mangelnder Kontrolle.{/n}
